item.title: CVE Program Report for Quarter 1 Calendar Year (Q1 CY) 2025
item.description: CVE Program Report for Quarter 1 Calendar Year (Q1 CY) 2025blogBy CVE Program|May 28, 2025The CVE Program’s quarterly summary of program milestones and metrics for Q1 CY 2025.

item.title: Harborist Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Harborist Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsMay 28, 2025Harboristis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for all projects listed underhttps://www.npmjs.com/~ljharb.

item.title: New CVE Board Member from NextJenSecurity
item.description: New CVE Board Member from NextJenSecuritynewsJune 3, 2025Jen Ellis ofNextJenSecurityhas joined theCVE Board.

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 229 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for June 2, 2025
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 229 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for June 2, 2025blogBy CVE Program|June 3, 2025

item.title: Teradyne Robotics Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Teradyne Robotics Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsJune 3, 2025Teradyne Roboticsis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for all products released by Teradyne Robotics subsidiaries, Universal Robots (UR) and Mobile Industrial Robots (MiR), including both actively supported and end-of-life/end-of-service products, as well as vulnerabilities in third-party software identified by Teradyne Robotics that are outside the scope of another CNA.

item.title: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on May 14 Now Available
item.description: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on May 14 Now AvailablenewsJune 10, 2025TheCVE Boardheld a teleconference meeting on May 14, 2025. Read themeeting minutes summary.

item.title: Jen Ellis of NextJenSecurity Joins CVE Board
item.description: Jen Ellis of NextJenSecurity Joins CVE BoardblogBy CVE Program|June 10, 2025TheCVE Programis pleased to welcome Jen Ellis ofNextJenSecurityas the newest member of theCVE Board. Jen will provide the Board with her invaluable research, corporate, and government perspectives.

item.title: Profisee Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Profisee Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsJune 10, 2025Profisee Group, Inc., is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities found in software developed by Profisee only.

item.title: OpenJS Foundation Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: OpenJS Foundation Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsJune 10, 2025OpenJS Foundationis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for all projects listed athttps://openjsf.org/projects.

item.title: “CVE List Keyword Search” on CVE.ORG Website Updated
item.description: “CVE List Keyword Search” on CVE.ORG Website UpdatedblogBy CVE Program|June 11, 2025“CVE List Keyword Search” on the CVE.ORG has been updated based upon feedback back from users. As a reminder, this search is for the CVE List only. It will only searchCVE Records. To search the overall website, use the “Site Search” located to the right of the CVE List search box above.
